What's appening?

Dobotex teams up with Colect.io to upgrade their mobile order entry

Dobotex - licensee of PUMA, HEAD, Levis, Tommy Hilfiger socks and underwear and Colect.io (formally known as Apps4Fashion) - supplier of innovative and efficient mobile order entry solutions - have teamed up to bring the mobile order entry process to a next level. more ›

Colect.io (by Apps4Fashion) warmly welcomes footwear brand Hinson

After a thorough search for the best mobile order solution Omniwear International, manufacturer of footwear brand Hinson, decided to implement the mobile order application of Colect.io more ›

Klerx Shoes successfully launches B2B web shop

Dutch footwear wholesaler, P.J. Klerx & Zonen located in Waalwijk, known from Red-Rag, Develop and Paul Green, has successfully launched their B2B web shop. more ›

A warm welcome to WHYRED

Together with our Swedish partner NaviPro we warmly welcome WHYRED to the Apps4Fashion family. With WHYRED we are extreme happy to service another great Swedish fashion brand with our digital catalogue and mobile order entry tool. more ›

Apps4Fashion says “Herzlich Wilkommen”â€‹ to Fynch-Hatton

We welcome this German "Familien Unternehmen" to the Apps4Fashion family and look forward to service them with our sales tools on their way to an 100 Million turnover! more ›

Happy New Year! To start 2017 we have released the new Colect B2B web portal

To start 2017 we are happy to inform you about the release of the brand new 'Colect B2B Webstore Pro Edition' (powered by Apps4Fashion). more ›

Vingino successfully launches B2B web portal powered by Apps4Fashion

Strongly growing denim kidswear brand Vingino recently launched their own web portal to service their independent B2B customers all over Europe with 24/7 direct access to stock collections, special stock offers, order history, POS and marketing material. more ›

Apps4Fashion powers DJ Kygo

Together with our Norwegian partner DEKON IT we warmly welcome DJ Kygo. more ›

Congratulations: Kuyichi is back!

Kuyichi is back in business and continues using Apps4Fashion for their order entry. more ›
